mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_anonymous_comment ( writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate ) VALUES(#{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, regdate FROM board_anonymous_comment WHERE ref_group=#{num} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC
